page.topic: Providing Multiple Language Support in a Page Layout
page.description: Multilingual support can be added to the Page Layout Component using Text Dictionary tags and language definitions.
page.discussion: Alpha Anywhere's Text Dictionary tags (<a5:t>...</a5:t>) and language definition tags (<a5:r>...</a5:r>) can be used to add multiple language support to a Page Layout component. Translations are defined with the *[ui:Language definitions]* and *[ui:Text dictionary tags]*, and *[ui:Active language]* properties for the [Page Layout].

videos.title: Multiple Lanugage Support in a PageLayout and Tabbed UI Component
videos.description: In this video, we demonstrate how to add language tags to a component to support mutliple languages in a web application.
